snippet: The Mercedes-Benz E550 Cabriolet is a four-seater that wears its sportiness in a reserved way. It seems best suited for a casual daylong cruise, perfect for a honeymoon drive along the California coast.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column reviews the 2013 Mercedes-Benz E550 Cabriolet.
lead_paragraph: The Mercedes-Benz E550 Cabriolet is a four-seater that wears its sportiness in a reserved way. It seems best suited for a casual daylong cruise, perfect for a honeymoon drive along the California coast.
